statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_name HAVING SUM(purchase_amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT product_name) AS unique_products FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 50;
SELECT customer_id, product_name FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 500 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount_spent > 500;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(loyalty_points) AS avg_loyalty_points FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE p.quantity > 10 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(unit_price * quantity) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name, pr.category FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id ORDER BY pr.category ASC, c.customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM Customers c JOIN Purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products;

SELECT c.customer_name, cc.campaign_id, ca.campaign_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_campaigns cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN campaigns ca ON cc.campaign_id = ca.campaign_id WHERE ca.start_date > '2022-01-01';
